# Welcome to the Coyote Sector! This is the place where you can find lore on the myriad of factions and species out here on the Frontier.
This entry specifically serves as a glossary, where you can find links to the entries where there is lore.
[textlink="Primer & The Big Five" link="CharacterCreation/]
For now, it is just the Primer and The Big Five, but soon you will be able to find lore on SolGov and the USSP.
